value: This is the very first English course that you will be taking. It will be introducing you to some basic vocabulary and grammar concepts.
Is course ko use karne ke liye instructions neeche diye gae hain:
Vocabulary : In sabhi 100 words ke meaning ko samajhna hai. Mentors can quickly check if the mentee knows some of these words.
Introduction of Self : Watch the video(s) and complete the assignment. By the end of this, one should be able to introduce themselves with some confidence.
Nouns : Videos ya text se seekhein, exercises complete karein. Mentors to judge understanding of concept.
Reading_Practice : Read the stories and solve the exercise. Mentors to see if mentees need to do this. If not, mark complete.
CommonMistakesWhile_Speaking : This video is optional to watch. There are no assignments or exercises related to this.
ThereorTheir : This video is optional to watch. There are no assignments or exercises related to this.
